channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: I Want My Remains Kept Inside Spotify and Liquid Death’s Speaker Urn
item.description: Dying to get inside this morbid Bluetooth speaker marketing gimmick.

item.title: Découvrez les nouveaux Samsung Galaxy S26 en direct sur Twitch dès 18h30
item.description: La première Samsung Galaxy Unpacked de l’année a lieu ce mercredi 25 février 2026, à partir de 19h. Frandroid couvre évidemment cette grande conférence où seront présentés les nouveaux Galaxy S26. Sans grande surprise, nous serons en direct sur notre chaîne Twitch Frandroidlive à partir de 18h30.

item.title: En attendant les annonces d’Apple, l’Apple Watch Series 11 dans son format XXL est à prix cassé sur Amazon
item.description: Rarement en promotion depuis son lancement, l’Apple Watch Series 11 refait enfin surface à prix réduit. La montre connectée haut de gamme d’Apple s’affiche aujourd’hui à 409 euros dans son grand format 46 mm, contre 479 euros habituellement.

item.title: Xiaomi’s magnetic power bank is incredibly thin
item.description: It was originally teased to be announced at Mobile World Congress 2026 in Barcelona, Spain, this weekend, but Xiaomi has already shared all the details for its new super slim wireless power bank on its Australian website. The Xiaomi UltraThin Magnetic Power Bank 5000 features a 5,000mAh battery, as the name implies, and is just […]

item.title: Discord remet la vérification d’âge à plus tard sur fond de polémique
item.description: La messagerie Discord recule face aux contestations des utilisateurs concernant le système de vérification d'âge.

item.title: WhatsApp va (enfin) vous laisser protéger votre compte avec un vrai mot de passe
item.description: Vous pensiez que sécuriser une application de messagerie avec un vrai mot de passe était une évidence ? Pas pour WhatsApp, qui aura attendu seize longues années avant de s'y mettre. L'application de Meta prépare enfin l'intégration de ce bouclier classique pour contrer les piratages de comptes.

item.title: La mémoire pèse désormais 35 % du coût d’un PC chez HP
item.description: La mémoire représente une part de plus en plus importante dans la facture des composants des PC vendus par HP. Le constructeur rassure cependant sur son approvisionnement, qui est assuré pour l'année 2026. Mais ensuite ?

item.title: Bridging the AI-CRM Gap: How mid-market businesses can get ahead in 2026
item.description: The CEO of Workbooks shares his thoughts on how businesses can get ahead in 2026 with AI/CRM integration.

item.title: Does Anthropic think Claude is alive? Define ‘alive’
item.description: Over the past several weeks, as more and more Anthropic executives do interviews on a publicity blitz for Claude, one thing has gotten increasingly clear: Anthropic sure seems to think Claude is alive in some way, shape, or form. "Alive" is obviously a loaded term; the more frequently used word is "conscious." If you ask […]

item.title: CrowdStrike says attackers are moving through networks in under 30 minutes
item.description: Breakout time is the clearest signal of how intrusion has changed, researchers say, as they see data exfiltration within minutes of initial compromise.

item.title: Fuite à la CAF : les données des bénéficiaires au RSA ont été piratées
item.description: Une nouvelle cyberattaque secoue l'État français. En piratant un service de l'État, un cybercriminel est parvenu à voler des informations relatives à la CAF (Caisse d'Allocations Familiales). Les données des bénéficiaires au RSA ont été compromises, dont le numéro de sécurité sociale, le matricule allocataire, et les coordonnées complètes.

item.title: Apple brings age verification to UK users in iOS 26.4 beta
item.description: Apple is bringing age verification to the UK, as the latest iOS 26.4 beta prompts users to verify that they're over 18 following installation. As shown in screenshots posted to Reddit, Apple says users who don't confirm their age "will not be able to download and purchase apps or make in-app purchases." In one of […]

item.title: 'Basically zero' — top Goldman Sachs economist says AI barely had any positive effect on the US economy in 2025
item.description: Though AI's impact on the US economy might not have been so big, it's certainly set to continue rising globally.

item.title: Comment suivre le Samsung Unpacked pour découvrir en direct les nouveaux smartphones Galaxy
item.description: On y est. C'est aujourd'hui, mercredi 25 février, que Samsung abat ses cartes pour l'année 2026. Entre le Galaxy S26 Ultra qui a fait une cure d'amincissement et les promesses de l'IA agentique, il y a de quoi dire. Voici comment ne rien rater.

item.title: C’est la plus grande image jamais produite par Alma : le cœur chaotique de la Voie lactée se dévoile enfin
item.description: Les noyaux actifs de galaxies avec des trous noirs géants sont à des centaines de millions voire des milliards d'années-lumière de la Voie lactée. Les conditions de formation des premières étoiles moins d'un milliard d'années après le Big Bang sont difficilement observables. Heureusement, des...

item.title: Sony Wants to Rework Its ‘Spider-Man’ Spinoff Plans
item.description: Plus, the new 'Scary Movie' may have found the films it wants to spoof.

item.title: You can now make Alexa’s AI personality more friendly, blunt, or chilled out
item.description: Amazon is giving you more control over how Alexa behaves during conversations and responses. Three "personality style" presets are launching today for Alexa Plus users in the US that allow you to make the AI-powered voice assistant more concise, cheerful, or relaxed, depending on your personal preferences. "Alexa's personality is one of the things customers […]...

item.title: Adobe’s new AI video editing tool stitches clips into a first draft
item.description: Adobe is launching a new Firefly tool that helps video editors to focus on storytelling by creating a first cut to refine and build around. The Quick Cut feature is launching in beta today for Firefly's video editor, allowing users to automatically assemble clips together based on text prompts and simple creator inputs. "Quick Cut […]

item.title: Harbinger acquires autonomous driving company Phantom AI
item.description: It's the Los Angeles trucking startup's first acquisition — the latest in a series of moves to spin up new revenue streams.

item.title: Jira’s latest update allows AI agents and humans to work side by side
item.description: Atlassian is unveiling "agents in Jira" which gives users the ability to assign and manage work given to AI agents the same as humans.

item.title: Y Combinator grad and AI insurance brokerage Harper raises $47M
item.description: Harper is an AI-native insurance brokerage that just raised a $45 million combined Series A and seed, after a member of YC's Winter 2025 cohort.

item.title: Amazon’s AI-powered Alexa+ gets new personality options
item.description: Users will be able to choose from Alexa styles like Brief, Chill or Sweet, Amazon says.

item.title: Adobe Firefly’s video editor can now automatically create a first draft from footage
item.description: Adobe Firefly is getting a new feature called Quick Cut that uses AI to edit footage to create a first draft of the final video based on user instructions.

item.title: What is the release date for Monarch: Legacy of Monsters season 2 episode 1 on Apple TV?
item.description: Here's when Monarch: Legacy of Monsters season 2's first chapter will air on Apple TV.

item.title: Alexa+ just got a personality upgrade — you can now choose whether it’s brief, chill, or your biggest cheerleader
item.description: Amazon has added three customizable personality styles to Alexa+, letting users control how the assistant responds without changing its core functionality.

item.title: Amazon introduces three personality styles for Alexa+
item.description: Amazon is offering a new way for Alexa+ users to customize the AI assistant's communication style. The company has introduced three personalities for Alexa+, so the assistant can adopt an attitude that is Brief, Chill or Sweet. The Brief style will be exactly that: no small talk and no extra conversation. Chill is easygoing and seems to be inspired by caricatures of the surfer/stoner type, while the Sweet mode is almost aggressively perky and chipper. In the audio sample provided, when a user asks "Alexa, how's it going?" the Chill voice responds, "Life’s treating me well – all systems are Zen...

item.title: Spotify can reorder your playlists by BPM and key
item.description: Spotify is rolling out a new feature that’s meant to make transitions in between tracks even smoother. If you’ll recall, the streaming service released the ability to create customized transitions within playlists in August last year. It gave people a way to create uninterrupted progressions and eliminate awkward silences between songs. Now, Premium users will be able to make sure the songs in their playlists flow seamlessly even further by reordering tracks based on their keys and BPM or beats per minute. The new feature can rearrange playlists with one tap. All paying users have to do is tap...

item.title: Comment clôturer son compte Sumeria ?
item.description: À partir du 12 mars 2026, la banque en ligne Sumeria appliquera des frais d'inactivité à hauteur de 3 euros par mois. Pour celles et ceux qui ont téléchargé Sumeria juste pour rembourser un pote, voici la démarche pour clôturer son compte et passer à autre chose.

item.title: Amazon continues retreat from games by ending publishing deal for open-world racer
item.description: Amazon continues to scale back its gaming efforts, this time by ending a notable publishing deal. The Game Business reports that Amazon will no longer be the publisher of an upcoming open-world racing title from Maverick Games, a new studio made up of former Forza developers. The deal was originally announced in 2024. The news […]

item.title: 1Password augmente fortement le prix de ses abonnements : quelles sont les meilleures alternatives ?
item.description: Le gestionnaire de mots de passe 1Password annonce une forte hausse de ses abonnements. Il existe pourtant de très bonnes alternatives bien moins chères.

item.title: Après le DSA, maintenant le RGPD : les États-Unis partent en guerre contre la protection des données en Europe
item.description: L'administration Trump ouvre un nouveau front contre l'Union européenne. Les diplomates américains ont désormais pour consigne de combattre les tentatives de réguler l'hébergement des données collectées par les entreprises américaines à l'étranger. Le règlement général sur la protection des données, pierre angulaire de la politique numérique européenne, est dans le collimateur....

item.title: Khosla’s Keith Rabois backs Comp, which wants to bolster HR teams with AI
item.description: The HR tech startup, which currently operates in Brazil, has raised a $17.25 million Series A.

item.title: Xiaomi affiche son chargeur sans fil Qi 50 W à moins de 40 € : c’est le meilleur rapport performance/prix du moment
item.description: Dans le (très) large catalogue de Xiaomi, on trouve un chargeur sans fil compatible avec la norme Qi de type socle, dont la puissance de charge s'élève à 50 W. De quoi ranimer rapidement un smartphone. En ce moment, la marque chinoise le propose à 39,99 euros au lieu de 49,99 euros.

item.title: Pokémon TCG: Perfect Order Booster Box preorders are $211 at TCGplayer — save vs. Walmart
item.description: The Pokémon TCG: Perfect Order Booster Box is $211 at TCGplayer, beating Walmart’s $229.95 preorder price.

item.title: Sonos apparently has yet another app overhaul in the works, hopes you've forgotten 2024
item.description: Should we make the point about the definition of insanity being doing the same thing over and over and expecting a different outcome?

item.title: Look alive, bub — Marvel's Wolverine gets long-awaited release date and yes, it's still coming this year
item.description: Insomniac Games has locked in the Marvel's Wolverine release date — and it's coming sooner than you might think.

item.title: AMC is closing more theaters: List of doomed cinema locations will grow in 2026 as meme stock craze sputters
item.description: In an earnings call on Tuesday, the chain’s chief financial officer said AMC will continue to shutter more locations than it opens going forward. AMC, the world’s largest movie theater chain and a one-time darling of meme stock traders, said this week that it expects to continue closing more movie theaters than it opens going forward.

item.title: How to watch Sri Lanka vs. New Zealand in the 2026 T20 World Cup online for free
item.description: How to watch T20 World Cup for free. Live stream Sri Lanka vs. New Zealand in the 2026 T20 World Cup for free from anywhere in the world.

item.title: Soundcore lance les Nebula P1 et P1i, deux vidéoprojecteurs pensés pour la mobilité avec des enceintes originales
item.description: La marque soundcore, appartenant à Anker Innovations, dévoile officiellement deux nouveaux vidéoprojecteurs Nebula, les P1 et P1i, conçus pour apporter une image grand format et un son intégré ou déporté, avec Google TV et Netflix au cœur de l’expérience.

item.title: Si vous avez un compte Sumeria (ex-Lydia), la plateforme va vous facturer des « frais d’inactivité »
item.description: Banque en ligne extrêmement populaire en France, du fait de sa filiation avec le service Lydia, Sumeria va commencer à facturer des « frais d’inactivité » pour les comptes qui n’utilisent pas le service.

item.title: 1Password is getting more expensive soon - says change is despite the fact ‘pricing has remained largely unchanged for many years’
item.description: 1Password is raising its prices, but it's still cheaper than it was 14 years ago.

item.title: Behold the Haunting Gaze of C-3PO’s Disembodied Head From ‘The Empire Strikes Back’
item.description: The 'Star Wars' relic is part of a large entertainment memorabilia auction hosted by Propstore in March.

item.title: Uber previews its Dubai air taxi service
item.description: Uber is one step closer to going airborne. On Wednesday, the company previewed its air taxi booking service ahead of an expected launch in Dubai later this year. The inaugural Uber Air program will let travelers book Joby Aviation's electric air taxis through a familiar process in the Uber app.The experience of booking an air taxi will be much like reserving a four-wheeled Uber. In the app, after entering your destination, Uber Air will appear as an option for eligible routes. The Uber app will book a flight and an Uber Black to pick you up and drop you off at a Joby "vertiport."The process of...
